content: dear crochet lover this is a free crochet pattern the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology instructions are easy to follow if you are familiar with basic crochet techniques never hesitate to contact me should you have any questions with regards to this pattern i will do my best to help you as best as possible copyright it s for personal use only you may not sell share printed or online reproduce distribute any part of it thank you  so go ahead and start your magical craft don t forget to enjoy 1 skill level easy size approx 2 5 cm the size will be determined by the type of yarn size hook and your personal gauge materials you can use any yarn that is comfortable and suitable for you *yarn e g fine 2 sport *i used yarn 1 76 oz/174 yds 160 m/50 g jeans by yarn art 55% cotton 45% pac white red *crochet hook 2 mm or according to the yarn you use *scissors *yarn needle abbreviations  magic_ring - magic_ring crochet stitches in to the adjustable loop  chain s chain s  st s stitch s  slip_stitch slip_stitch  single_crochet single_crochet  increase two single_crochet stitches in the same stitch  decrease two single_crochet stitches together  r round  - parentheses are used for repeated patterns of stitches example 2 single_crochet increase x 6 means repeat 6 times 2 single_crochet and one increase  f o fastening off * work in spirals do not join slip_stitch or turn unless otherwise stated in the pattern * use a stitch marker in the beginning of each round this will help to mark the first stitch of every round * all stitches are worked in both loops unless stated otherwise in the pattern 2 mushroom cap r1 6 single_crochet in the magic_ring =6 r2 single_crochet in each st around =6 r3 1 single_crochet increase x 3 =9 r4 single_crochet in each st around =9 r5 2 single_crochet increase x 3 =12 r6 1 single_crochet increase x 6 =18 r7 2 single_crochet increase x 6 =24 r8 single_crochet in each st around =24 to finish make 1 slip_stitch f o hide the ends of the yarn and cut yarn 3 stipe r1 6 single_crochet in the magic_ring =6 r2 1 single_crochet increase x 3 =9 r3 single_crochet in each st around =9 r4 1 single_crochet decrease x 3 =6 r5-7 single_crochet in each st around =6 r8 increase x 6 =12 r9 3 single_crochet increase x 3 =15 f o leave a long tail for sewing assembly sew stipe to the mushroom cap embroider white dots on the mushroom cap 4 congratulations your amanita is ready i wish you every success https //www etsy com/shop/pattern4craft https //www ravelry com/people/pattern4craft https //www youtube com/channel/ucyvvxcvp0xasv9gzufhqala http //www instagram com/pattern_4_craft 5
